name: Lit (itch) (wAlter_Ego)
description:
Lit is about using quantum interference to give life to a plant,  explaining the physic behind the process via videogame.

Credits

Walter Marino - Game Design
Giovanni Palmitesta - Sound Design
Andrea Cianfanelli - Programming
Noora Heiskanen - 2D Art
Nicola Pranzini - Quantum Physicist
Dario Alexander Chisholm - Quantum Physicist
Marilù Chiofalo - Quantum Physicist
